CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946, pg. 17 reads: "...Take Time To Picnic - Participants in recent annual bridge tournament of the American Bridge Association, held here last week, along with friends and well-wishers, enjoyed themselves at a gala outing at South Park last week. The picnic was enjoyed by over... persons and their friends, as the bridge enthusiasts took time off from their steady playing to enjoy well-earned diversion. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of American Bridge Association bridge tournament participants, family, and friends, gathered in front of building for picnic at South Park
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Allegheny County (Pa.).Department of Parks, Recreation, and Conservation.South Park.
